sub_topic: Probability of drawing a certain card from a deck of cards
message_1: What is the probability of drawing a 4 of hearts from a standard deck of 52 cards?
message_2:
There is only one 4 of hearts in a standard deck of 52 cards. Therefore, the probability of drawing a 4 of hearts is 1 out of 52, which can be expressed as:

1/52 or approximately 0.0192 or 1.92%
